title: Simulated Clouds For Raster Files
text: goal nimbus simulate cloud cover add raster files.

title: Simulated Clouds For Raster Files
text: can install development version nimbus GitHub :

title: Simulated Clouds For Raster Files
text: First load package. illustrate adding cloud cover example raster. First look example raster  simulate 70 × 70 pixels cloud
code: library(nimbus) ## basic example code library(raster) #> Loading required package: sp plot(example_raster) cloud <- simulate_cloud(phi = 0.1, seed = 2023) plot(cloud)

title: simulate cloud — simulate_cloud
text: cloud_size size grid along axis. phi parameter control structure cloud seed seed pass ensure reproducibility form type cloud, either smooth pixellated

title: simulate cloud — simulate_cloud
code: library(raster) cloud <- simulate_cloud(cloud_size = 10, phi = 0.1) #> Not seed passed so set to 2023 plot(cloud)
